data.name: Truck World: Driving School
data.detailed_description:
ADD FULL GAME TO YOUR WISHLIST

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1327040/Truck_World_Australia/


About the Game

Learn to drive your rig

Discover all the intricate controls necessary to successfully drive a large rig in otherwise inhospitable conditions of the Outback

Perform difficult maneuvers

Undertake a number of basic and advanced challenges and lessons to fully master tricky maneuvers that will come in handy in difficult or tight spots

Get the perfect score

Embrace the challenge and commit yourself to getting the perfect score on a variety of advanced graded lessons

Handle difficult cargo

Find out what it takes to drive a truck with various kinds of cargo and trailers

Tinker with controls in the cabin

Become familiar with the interaction with the inside of the truck, as well as with the mirror and seat settings

data.short_description: Learn the basics of truck driving! Truck World: Driving School is a free standalone truck simulator with challenges, grades, and much more.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i3-4130 3.4 GHz / AMD Ryzen 3 2200U 3.4 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB, GeForce GTX 660 / Radeon R9 270
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
